hero.title: Centralize Customer Communication Across All Channels
hero.subtitle: Manage tickets, integrate email, social media, WhatsApp, and phone calls in one unified platform. Streamline support operations with powerful analytics and team collaboration tools.

features.title: Everything You Need for Customer Support
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to help your team deliver exceptional customer service

ticketManagement.title: Complete Ticket Management
ticketManagement.description: Organize, track, and resolve customer issues efficiently with our intuitive ticket system. Assign priorities, set due dates, and collaborate with your team.

emailIntegration.title: Email Integration
emailIntegration.description: Connect your email accounts and manage all customer emails directly from EchoDesk. No more switching between platforms.

sipCalling.title: SIP Calling Integration
sipCalling.description: Make and receive calls directly from the platform. Call recording, call history, and real-time call analytics included.

advancedForms.title: Advanced Forms
advancedForms.description: Create custom forms attachable to tickets. Collect structured information and streamline your support workflow.

facebook.title: Messenger API
facebook.description: Respond to Facebook messages from multiple pages in one unified inbox. Never miss a customer message.

instagram.title: Instagram API
instagram.description: Manage Instagram DMs alongside all other channels. Keep your social media support organized and efficient.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Business API
whatsapp.description: Connect your WhatsApp Business account and handle customer conversations at scale with advanced features.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Track team performance, response times, resolution rates, and customer satisfaction with detailed reports and dashboards.

teamCollaboration.title: Team Collaboration
teamCollaboration.description: Assign tickets, mention colleagues, leave internal notes, and work together seamlessly to solve customer issues.

automation.title: Workflow Automation
automation.description: Automate repetitive tasks with custom workflows. Set up rules for automatic ticket routing, responses, and escalations.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: Your data is protected with industry-standard encryption, secure authentication, and regular backups.

realtime.title: Real-Time Updates
realtime.description: Stay in sync with your team with instant notifications and live updates across all devices.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Full support for English and Georgian languages. Serve your customers in their preferred language.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your team size and needs. No hidden fees.

essential.name: Essential
essential.description: Perfect for small teams getting started with customer support

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Basic customer support for small businesses

pricing.paymentNote: All payments processed securely through Bank of Georgia

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Customer Support?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of businesses using EchoDesk to deliver exceptional customer service
cta.noCreditCard: No credit card required • 14-day free trial

footer.tagline: Centralize customer communication across all channels
